resources.string: You can increase your max rpm by increasing caburetor size.
You can increase your max power by increasing bore and stroke size of your piston.
You can increase performance by upgrading your motorcycle spark plug.\nThis can make your motorcycle engine sound more smooth, better spark plug fire and slightly increased performance.
You can use high octane gasoline for better performance or adding some octane booster.\nBut this increase your engine heat and may cause your engine overheat.
You can increase your max rpm by increasing carburetor size.\nBut carburetor size just change your motorcycle torque character.
You can increase your max power by incresing bore and stroke size of your piston.
